players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.

Diana: "
"
You: "I am innocent and need your help to catch the mafia"
Bob: "I am the detective and investigated Diana, who is the mafioso."
Bob: "I am the detective and have identified Diana as the mafioso. Alice, can you please provide any information that might help us catch her?"
Diana: "I am the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. I will continue to protect my own."
You: "I am innocent and I believe Bob made a mistake. Can anyone provide any evidence or information to support his claim?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.

The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.

"

You: "I am the detective and have identified Diana as the mafioso. Alice, can you please provide any information that might help us catch her?"
Diana: "I am the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. I will continue to protect my own."
Alice: "I am innocent and I believe Bob made a mistake. Can anyone provide any evidence or information to support his claim?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested
